Sequence Information.Peptide Name: AI18 (AI Predicted AMPs, Arg-rich, UCLL1c, XXA)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 32 ug/ml), S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 32 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC 700603 and 3 resistant strains (MIC 8-32 ug/ml), A. baumannii  ATCC 19606 or MDR 316039 (8 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 or MDR 304238 (MIC 8-16 ug/ml), E. coli ATCC 25922 or MDR 103231 (MIC 4-8 ug/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: In vitro toxicity: not hemo.lytic at 100 ug/ml (HC50>100 ug/ml).

Literature.Author: Wang J, Feng J, Kang Y, Pan P, Ge J, Wang Y, Wang M, Wu Z, Zhang X, Yu J, Zhang X, Wang T, Wen L, Yan G, Deng Y, Shi H, Hsieh CY, Jiang Z, Hou T. 2025
Literature.Title: Discovery of antimicrobial peptides with notable antibacterial potency by an LLM-based foundation model.

Sequence Information.Comments: Animal model:mouse: XDR K. pneumoniae 325016 infected pneumonia mouse model, neutropenic mice, intratracheal i.t./i.p., 99% bacterial reduction (~2 log) in lung treated at 10 mg/kg at 2 and 12 h postinfection.
